text: Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ etaṃ mama esohamasmi eso me attā ti
edit: Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ – etaṃ mama esohamasmi eso me attā ti?

translations.transtext: Which [is] impermanent, suffering, normally changing, is it suitable to see that thus, "This [is] mine; I am this; This is my self"?
